ModMetaData.name: Project Armory 1.4.0.1 [1.4]
ModMetaData.author: Plymouth
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.4.0.1
Hey there!
Project Armoury 20th century pack adds 288 weapon designs from the later half of 20th century to rimworld(1945-2000), which are extensively balanced using linear mathematical conversion and approximation formulas,this mod aims to add a lot of variety while remaining vanilla balance-friendly, as well as lore-friendly. Each weapon design has a short description of it's origins. This mod has been a long time in the making, and if you see any bugs be it duplicated descriptions or weapon being utterly unbalanced please do report!
Back in Business update.
Mod right now should be fully compatible with 1.4. [XND] Proper Shotguns integration is back, now the shotguns work as they should - firing many pellets.
__________________________________________ New guns in 1.4 are:
Assault Rifles:
AK-9 AK-12 AK-15 Barrett REC7 BMCR CZ Bren 2 MSBS Grot FN F2000 FN SCAR-L Vepr AK-308
Battle rifles:
SCAR-H ___________________________________________
The mod includes: 41 Sniper rifles (14 of which are anti-materiel) 13 Rifles 69 Assault rifles (9 of which are Battle Rifles) 17 Light Machineguns 45 Sub-machineguns 37 Shotguns 33 Pistols 21 Revolvers 12 Rocket launchers
